collection_summary.collection_challenges: Many company websites had access restrictions, 404 errors, or JavaScript-heavy pages that were not accessible via web scraping. Successfully collected data from DECTA, easyMarkets, Quadcode, CPM, and JCC Payment Systems. Additional data collection included 5 new companies (Mastercard, MY.GAMES, Depositphotos, DataArt, Admirals) with some having JavaScript-heavy career pages or access restrictions that limited direct job scraping, requiring alternative data collection methods including LinkedIn insights and market analysis.

companies: HF Markets Group - https://hfmarkets.com (403 error after redirect)
Mellow - https://mellow.com (JavaScript redirect, no career content)
Cyta - https://cyta.com.cy (careers link exists but no specific jobs listed)
INKTECH - https://inktech.com (redirects to unrelated ink/toner e-commerce site)
JCC Payment Systems - 9 job openings collected

recommendations.manual_collection_needed: Many companies require direct website visits or contacting their HR departments for current job openings
recommendations.linkedin_strategy: Using LinkedIn company pages or job search might yield better results for companies with 403 errors or inaccessible career pages
recommendations.company_contact: Direct outreach to HR departments may be necessary for comprehensive data collection, especially for companies like DataArt, Depositphotos that have career pages but no listed positions
recommendations.periodic_updates: Job openings change frequently, requiring regular updates to maintain accuracy
recommendations.access_challenges: Many companies (GetTransfer, HF Markets, inDrive) have implemented bot protection or access restrictions making automated scraping difficult
recommendations.successful_collection_methods: Companies with dedicated job portals (easyMarkets via Peopleforce, Quadcode via jobs.quadcode.com) provided the most comprehensive data. Additional success achieved through LinkedIn research and market analysis for companies with restricted access.
recommendations.next_steps: Consider using professional APIs, LinkedIn integration, or manual research for the remaining 13 Premium and 5 Professional tier companies

cyprus_tech_market_insights_2025.market_overview: Cyprus tech market shows strong growth with high demand for software engineers, data scientists, and fintech professionals
cyprus_tech_market_insights_2025.work_arrangement_trends: Most companies offer remote/hybrid options, with increasing acceptance of fully remote work
